cookingTips: Choose very fresh, ripe figs that are soft but not mushy
Tear prosciutto into smaller pieces rather than cutting for more rustic presentation
Assemble just before serving to prevent figs from browning and to keep prosciutto crisp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through assembling elegant, simple appetizer bites with the classic pairing of figs and prosciutto.
